data.title: Digital Business Card for Teams and Individuals
data.meta_description: The best digital business card for individuals and teams. Create your free digital business card or get your team set up in seconds. Raise your networking game today.
data.text:
The digital business card thatâs always by my side

Gone are the days where I used to provide a business card to a client who then lost it and never called me again. Since using blinq the amount of callbacks Iâve gotten from clients has at least doubled. Customer service has also been fantastic as they helped me set up an enterprise account for my entire business and employees!

@sayless21, App Store Australia

Simple - effective - amazing!

Iâve had Blinq now for 4 months and LOVE how easy it is to use and effective it is!! This is the RIGHT app for sharing my info and with the photo option itâs super easy for anyone to grab my information! I couldnât be happier!

Very impressed.

These guys have created a highly functional and ergonomic app that is simple and effective. Also Iâve just experienced their customer service which was lightning fast and helpful. Instantly fixed my issue with it. I know this sounds like a cheesy ad but Iâm genuinely impressed.

Love this app

Really easy to use. So much better than carrying around business cards and with lots of additional features. I use in everyday business and itâs a must for networking events. Very professional organisational support. Highly recommend.

@super_nova_, App Store Australia

Share your contact details easily: A digital business card is the quickest and easiest way to share your professional identity.

â

âYour card is always with you: It can be added to your smartphone watch or your widgets screen to ensure it goes wherever you and your device goes, no need to carry paper cards anymore.

â

âWorks every time: Those who receive your card donât need the Blinq app to get your contact details.

â

âAlways stay up-to-date: If you change your contact information on your QR code business card, those who have your card will see your updated information.

Theyâre all the same! You can create your digital business card via the Blinq app or website. When you create it, a QR code will be generated. When people scan the QR code with their phone camera, your card will appear on a webpage. The user can then download your vCard, which contains your contact information, from this page to save your contact details in their phone. Itâs quick and easy!

Blinq is the top-rated QR code business card app on the App Store and the Play Store, with a 4.9/5 rating. Weâre also the fastest growing app.

Blinq is the quickest and easiest way to share your contact details with people. You can share your logo, profile picture, job title, company name, your headline, emails, phone numbers, links and more.

Create your free Blinq digital business card in seconds.

You can create your own Blinq digital business card for free! Start by downloading our top rated iOS app or Android app, or get started using our web dashboard.Â

â

Our onboarding process will guide you through the setup process including how to customize your card with logos, profile images, colours and more. Youâll then be ready to share your digital business card in seconds!

â

You can also sign up for Blinq Premium to create more cards for yourself or for Blinq Business if youâre looking to create cards for your wider business team. For full pricing information view our Pricing Page.

Blinq cards are designed to be shared the way that works best for you. Recipients donât have to have the Blinq app to receive your card or share their details with you.

â

When you meet face to face, your recipient can scan your digital business cardâs QR code or smartphone widget. You can also download your unique QR code and add it to your website, brochures, billboards, the contact section of your website, wherever you like!

â

Or you can choose to share via, text, email, your cards url link, NFC cards or even with your Apple Watch.

Blinq offers NFC or âNear Fields Communicationâ business cards for you and your team. NFC cards have a chip embedded in each card that can be synced with your Blinq digital business card.Â

â

When you want to share your details, simply tap the card on the user's compatible smartphone which will bring up a link containing your Blinq card, it really is like magic. You can purchase NFC cards via our app or our website today. Alternatively, if you already have an NFC card made by another company, you can encode it with your Blinq card by encoding your Blinq card link onto it.
